com.cloudera.oryx.common.lang

Class AutoReadWriteLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.common.lang.AutoReadWriteLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadWriteLock

    public final class AutoReadWriteLock
extends Object
implements ReadWriteLock
    Makes a ReadWriteLock that can return AutoLocks and exposes autoReadLock() and autoWriteLock() like AutoLock.autoLock(). ReadWriteLock lock = ...; ... AutoReadWriteLock autoLock = new AutoReadWriteLock(lock); // Not locked try (AutoLock al = autoLock.autoReadLock()) { // variable required but unused // Locked ... } // Not locked
